Title: Transfers or disclosures not authorised by Union law

Paragraph 1.Description: Any judgment of a court or tribunal and any decision of an administrative authority of a third country requiring a controller or processor to transfer or disclose personal data.
Paragraph 1.Condition: May only be recognised or enforceable in any manner
Paragraph 1.Basis: If based on an international agreement, such as a mutual legal assistance treaty, in force between the requesting third country and the Union or a Member State.
Paragraph 1.Note: Without prejudice to other grounds for transfer pursuant to this Chapter.
